department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: Work under this project includes construction of a ground-mounted solar array at the Canso Causeway
full_summary:
# Solar Photovoltaic Ground Mount Array Tender

## Invitation to Qualify
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bids from qualified contractors to design, build, and install a 33 kW grid-tied ground mounted solar array at the Canso Causeway in Nova Scotia.

## Tender Details
* **Reference:** WS4382586691
* **Publication Date:** January 5, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** January 22, 2024, at 2:00 PM Eastern Time
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** February 13, 2024 (Pending successful completion of the tender process)
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Location:** Canso Causeway, Nova Scotia
* **Government of Canada’s Areas of Inclusion:** Please note that this opportunity is open to eligible businesses of all sizes under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Key Requirements
* Design, build, and install a 33 kW grid-tied ground-mounted solar array
* Connect the solar system to the existing Canso Canal electrical distribution system
* Ensure compliance with all relevant standards and regulations

## Bidder Information
For questions or requests for clarification, please contact Richard Parsons at richard.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

## Reference Documents
[Tender documents can be found on the Ariba platform](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18436155?extsite=MTg0MzYxNTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
